message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it has a lot of potential to benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900,000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less for the product. Given its value to me, I'm willing to offer $750,000. This would still be a good profit for you and a fair price for me.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to pay a lower price, but I'm still looking to make a decent profit on this sale. I'm willing to compromise and offer the product to you for $850,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my initial asking price.
